SourceProxy.label: SimPla reader

Documentation.long_help: Read a SimPla AMR file into an image m_data.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The PNG reader reads PNG (Portable Network Graphics) files, and the output is a uniform rectilinear (image/volume) dataset. The default file extension is .png.

StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file GetName for the SimPla reader.
